short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to search and replace text in input and textarea tags

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Simple Search and Replace extension for Google Chrome is a powerful tool that allows you to quickly search and replace text within input and textarea tags on web pages. With flexible customization options, this extension is a handy tool for efficiently performing text editing operations.

Key Features:
Quick Search: Swiftly search for text within input and textarea tags on web pages.

Flexible Replacement: Execute replacement operations with flexible options, including one-time or global replacement, case sensitivity options, and more.

Advanced Customization: Provide a variety of customization options to meet your specific needs, including advanced search and replace options.

Save Settings: The extension automatically saves your settings, saving you time when reusing them.

Benefits:
Time-Saving: Perform search and replace text operations quickly and effectively.

Seamless Integration: Operates directly within the Chrome browser without complex steps.

High Customization: Easily tailor settings to suit your specific requirements.

How to Use:
Open the web page where you want to perform the search and replace operation.
Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Enter the text you want to search for and replace.
Select the necessary options.
Click the "Search and Replace" button to complete the operation.
Easy to customize and use, the Simple Search and Replace extension helps you manage content on web pages quickly and efficiently.
